00016  *                              of RmBayesCertaintyGrid, RmBayesSonarModel, and RmPioneerController with helpers RmUtility and 
00017  *                              RmSettings; reintegrated with map viewer application
00018  * 18 Nov 2004: added map shift and rotation based on global origin given in contructor
00019  *                              fixed ostream& operator<<() bug where grid origin was assumed to be lower-left hand
00020  *                                      rather than center coordinate; includes sample code for manual grid iteration
00021  * 19 Nov 2004: added m_sonarReadings history, empty(), rotateBy() and update(r,o,s)
00022  * 20 Nov 2004: extracted local map functionality out into the RmLocalMap subclass
00023  *                              created pure virtual superclass RmSonarMap
00024  * 21 Nov 2004: removed log stream, made ostream& operator<<() param const, added put()
00025  *                              changed origin in m_prGrid initialization to a scaled coord
00026  * 23 Nov 2004: replaced logString.append() in updateRegion() with dynamic char* buffer
00027  * 29 Nov 2004: cppdoc
00028  * 20 Dec 2004: inherited from RmMutableCartesianGrid<float>
00029  */
